I recently stayed at Hotel Prodigy Santos Dumont, and overall, my experience was positive. The location was convenient, making it easy to access nearby attractions and transportation. There were a few downsides, such as Rooms did not have the coffee Machines and was little small as compared to other hotels. Also the gym timings starts from 7am, but these did not significantly affect my overall impression. In conclusion, I would recommend Hotel Prodigy Santos Dumont to others looking for a business trip, family vacation, or romantic getaway.
